title: DaNNy001
author: DaNNy001
created_time: January 11, 2023, 11:25:46 PMLast edit: January 12, 2023, 11:34:24 AM by DaNNy001
content: discussion thread of the Asian champions leagueSimilar to the famous and popular European champions league which sees all the top teams teams from all around Europe different leagues compete and fight it out to becoming the overall champions of Europe, thats the same purpose for the AFC champions league because its the competition that covers all top teams in the asian football federation competiting to see who is to be crowned the overall champion.names of some promising teams in the tournamental sadd fc of qataral hihal fc of Saudi Arabiafc urawa red diamond of Japanmumbai city of indiaal jazira of the u.a.eAs much attention is now been attracted to that region, i felt its proper we understand and follow up with their own champions league thread where we can discuss all the happenings in the competition.  Here is name of the most successful club in the competition (Al Hihal of Saudi Arabia with four titles to their name).Check out the details of top scorers and assist in the last competition afc goals and assist stats

comments.author: chigo
comments.body: urawa reds are waiting for their potential opponents in the final. The teams that will compete for positions in the final to become Urawa's opponent in the final are Al Hilal, Al Expert, Al Faisaly, Foolad, Al Duhail, Al Shabab, Nasaf and Al Rayyan.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: sorry for bumping this topic, I think this topic is important to revive.In the play-off round 22/8 Al Nassr successfully won against Al Ahli Dubai with a score of 4-2, in that match Cristiano Ronaldo did not score a goal, he only managed to make 1 assist.for the group 1 phase match tomorrow, al ittihad will face FC Olmaliq, I'm sure this is an easy match for ittihad, they are the favorite team to win this competition.
